Based in Saratoga Springs, New York, the

features several exhibits that celebrate the automotive history of New York. This includes a history of New York-based automakers, Racing in New York, the New York State Stock Car Hall of Fame as well as a private collection on display from Dyson Racing and a special exhibit celebrating six women drivers from 1900-1920 – a time when less than 10 percent of women were licensed drivers.
